name: Sparkles
description:
Use A,S,D,W to move around, aim with your mouse, find your materials for an armor.

You are a young person, post apocalyptic.  You are trying to find a way to save the world. Get out the sewers, through town, face the monster that caused it: Sparkles!

Will you beat the boss, or will you be running out of gold? What are those stones on his armor? 

github at:  https://github.com/quantm-labs/GameDevTV-2021

All artwork (besides the basic Unity blocks and Pro Builder forms) done by QuantM Labs. 

Trailer voiceover by Tim Ruswick! :D

Impulse motivation: All Game Jam participants!
